description: This file implements the MappingService class which provides methods for managing data mappings via API calls, including CRUD operations, validation, testing, rule management, transformations, import/export, and schema-based mapping generation.

classes.name: MappingService
classes.description: A service class providing methods to interact with mapping-related API endpoints for CRUD, validation, testing, rule management, transformations, import/export, and auto-generation features.

methods.name: getMappings
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of mappings with optional search term.

methods.name: getMapping
methods.description: Fetches a specific mapping by its ID.

methods.name: createMapping
methods.description: Creates a new mapping with provided mapping data.

methods.name: updateMapping
methods.description: Updates an existing mapping identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: deleteMapping
methods.description: Deletes a mapping specified by ID.

methods.name: testMapping
methods.description: Tests a mapping configuration with sample data.

methods.name: validateMapping
methods.description: Validates a mapping configuration to check its correctness and reports errors/warnings.

methods.name: generateMapping
methods.description: Auto-generates mapping rules between source and target schemas using AI/ML.

methods.name: getMappingRules
methods.description: Retrieves rules associated with a specific mapping.

methods.name: addMappingRule
methods.description: Adds a new rule to a specific mapping.

methods.name: updateMappingRule
methods.description: Updates an existing rule within a mapping.

methods.name: deleteMappingRule
methods.description: Deletes a specific rule from a mapping.

methods.name: getTransformations
methods.description: Retrieves transformations related to a specific mapping.

methods.name: addTransformation
methods.description: Adds a new transformation to a mapping.

methods.name: updateTransformation
methods.description: Updates an existing transformation within a mapping.

methods.name: deleteTransformation
methods.description: Removes a transformation from a mapping.

methods.name: exportMapping
methods.description: Exports a mapping configuration in specified format (JSON or YAML).

methods.name: importMapping
methods.description: Imports a mapping configuration from a provided file.
